[OTP] Get and show active customer orders history with OTP
issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*User Story / Description:*

As a customer I want to see my OTP orders on /factorform/settings/orders 
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
*Acceptance Criteria:*

*Testing Requirements:*

* Verify if OTP orders are properly billed
* Verify if SNS orders are properly billed
* Verify if both type of orders are billed after I did my first order and order a different type of order.

*Affected Brands:* 

* Factor Form VMS
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Accessibility Requirements:*
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#eae6ff}
*Developer Notes:*

* Endpoint: [http://localhost:3000/gw/api/customers/me/orders?country=FJ&limit=100&locale=en-US|http://localhost:3000/gw/api/customers/me/orders?country=FJ&limit=100&locale=en-US]
* whitelabel-web/packages/pages/settings/src/components/OrderHistory/OrderHistory.tsx 
{panel}



*References*:

*Manage Subscriptions:* 

* What to show when a customer does not have any subscription?

!image-20251128-212434.png|width=1153,height=1129,alt="image-20251128-212434.png"!



*Order History*

* Currently OTP orders are not shown

!image-20251128-212532.png|width=1267,height=1015,alt="image-20251128-212532.png"!

issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*User Story / Description:*

Daily Greens *Welcome Kit* sections should be updated to communicate that this is for SNS orders only.

Copy should be updated to SNS orders only in the following places:

* Section on {{/products}} page
* Greens product cards on {{/products}} page
* Section on {{/products/greens}} page
* Section on {{/signup}} page

{panel}

* Ensure the Welcome Kit copy is updated on Section on the following pages
** {{/products}} page
** Greens product cards on {{/products}} page

** Section on {{/signup}} page

Introduce Meal Shake & Creatine to VMS assortment
issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Overview:* 

We are aiming to add Meal Shake and Creatine products to the VMS offerings.

PRD with additional background: [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1eqT49tTHK2BG_RIUvEM_7uT6ShaeF5RSZuVP1zXtAFk/edit?tab=t.4w9mu9dyzkup|https://docs.google.com/document/d/1eqT49tTHK2BG_RIUvEM_7uT6ShaeF5RSZuVP1zXtAFk/edit?tab=t.4w9mu9dyzkup|smart-link] 
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
*Goals:* 

* Update All Products page to include 
** Meal Shake - Vanilla
** Meal Shake - Lemon
** Creatine - Unflavoured
** Creatine - Peach Mango 
* Create a PDP for Creatine
* Create a PDP for Meal Shake  
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#eae6ff}
*Resources:* 

Figma: [https://www.figma.com/design/bybh4HYm7NI8qgIRGZtnhp/Creatine---Meal-Shake-PDP-re-design?node-id=91-14341&t=5cqpKAcWpvIVi6jT-0|https://www.figma.com/design/bybh4HYm7NI8qgIRGZtnhp/Creatine---Meal-Shake-PDP-re-design?node-id=91-14341&t=5cqpKAcWpvIVi6jT-0|smart-link] 

Product Intake Forms: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rxz1-lOki6j0_XBV73pmogQDjvcLhZQCf2p7XVqxjDo/edit?gid=1539850972#gid=1539850972|https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rxz1-lOki6j0_XBV73pmogQDjvcLhZQCf2p7XVqxjDo/edit?gid=1539850972#gid=1539850972|smart-link] 

[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1y8IAysj0jpPYbNxi9DMHaSjafcMCplnpFiSoTicnUV4/edit?gid=840021641#gid=840021641|https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1y8IAysj0jpPYbNxi9DMHaSjafcMCplnpFiSoTicnUV4/edit?gid=840021641#gid=840021641|smart-link] 

Tech Investigation for new products: [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1OpXwkZuJzFZQR3LC4bYf_VmI_rkvOMSXXNN3ICQuQeg/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.pux3nhnhqrt7|https://docs.google.com/document/d/1OpXwkZuJzFZQR3LC4bYf_VmI_rkvOMSXXNN3ICQuQeg/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.pux3nhnhqrt7|smart-link] 
{panel}

issues.summary: [NPD] Create product tiles for Meal Shake & Creatine
issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*User Story / Description:*

As a shopper, I want to see all products and their flavours on /products page.

references:
[Product Intake Form - Meal Shake|https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rxz1-lOki6j0_XBV73pmogQDjvcLhZQCf2p7XVqxjDo/edit?gid=1539850972#gid=1539850972] 
[Product Intake Form - Creatine|https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1y8IAysj0jpPYbNxi9DMHaSjafcMCplnpFiSoTicnUV4/edit?gid=840021641#gid=840021641]
{panel}

*For Meal Shake:*

## _Meal Shake - Vanilla_
## _Meal Shake - Lemon_
# Link both tiles to the PDP page for the Meal Shake

*For Creatine:*

# Create 2 product tiles on the /products page as per designs ([~accountid:712020:38043296-ca6a-4308-9af2-173a9f590a4b] to update the designs)
#* _Creatine - Unflavoured_
#* _Creatine - Peach Mango_
# Link both tiles to the PDP page for the Creatine

*Testing Requirements:*

# Prices, images, titles, and descriptions should reflect the related Product Intake Forms

*Affected Brands:*

Factor Form
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Accessibility Requirements:*
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#eae6ff}
*Developer Notes:*

issues.summary: [All Products Page] update banner discount copy on product cards based on the discount type
issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*User Story / Description:*

As a RTE active customer who lands on Factor Form products page with a 50% year voucher applied, I should have consistent discount info over all voucher discount communications along the funnel.
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
*Acceptance Criteria:*

* Voucher offer should be properly contextualized over the all offer elements in all products and product details pages.
* The {{FJ-VMS-50OFF1YR-RTE-PEAK}} should present 1 Year 50% discount communication for RTE actives in the banner and other offer banners (product cards in all products page and quantity option in PDP greens)
* The communication for the fallback voucher, 40% off first order, should also be in conformance over all offer communication elements.

*Testing Requirements:*

* Offer presented by product cards should be the same provided by PPS service
* Offer presented by quantity options in the Greens page, should be the same given by the PPS service

*Affected Brands:*
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Accessibility Requirements:*
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#eae6ff}
*Developer Notes:*

This update enables discount banners in the card to present custom discount communication based on the discount communication ID provided in the URL.

To enable retro compatibility, we should ensure to handle cases where no discount communication id is attributed or when it does, to do not show the incorrect discount communication.

Required changes: 

* CUI → Discount Communication: Use some suitable key to provide the copy and add the placeholder for discount.
** We should use some not used field that is suitable for this purpose on VMS, or request support from owners (not found yet) to include the fields we need in the page
** Currently, this communication is done via Applanga only
* On Web, consolidate all SKUs that shows discount banner in the {{price-presentation/v2/discount_communication/voucher/}} service to obtain the copy for the given discount communication.
{pane

comments.author: Hamed Karimian
comments.body: [~accountid:62d18d3c078104d0866dc9b0] can you please update the ticket to also address the fallback mechanism we discussed yesterday?  i.e., if user is not an active Factor customer, all banners should properly fallback on the default “Limited time offer: 40% off first order!“

issues.summary: Order total is flashing on the Cancellation page
issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Description:*

When navigating to the Cancellation page, the order total number re-renders many times. This bug only occurs sometimes and is resolved by refreshing the page.

See this Slack thread for more details/context:
[https://hellofresh.slack.com/archives/C0374928SNN/p1762454253222599|https://hellofresh.slack.com/archives/C0374928SNN/p1762454253222599|smart-link] 

*Steps to Reproduce:*

* Navigate to the account settings page (/factorform/settings/subscriptions/supplements) 
* Click the “Cancel supplement subscription” button within the Status box.
* Select a reason for cancelling and then select the “Cancel subscription” button.
* Enter feedback and then click the “Submit feedback” button
* Look at the “Restart you supplement subscription box” and view the order total
** This may or may not be re-rendering
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
*Expected result:*

* The order total does not re-render and flash on the screen

*Testing Requirements:*

* Tested in staging on desktop
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
*Actual result:*

* The order total is re-rendering and flashing on the screen
{panel}

issues.summary: [Relic] FactorForm "meal selection"
issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Description*

FactorForm uses a non-standard model of making meal selections for customers.

Since other brands sell a box for a price and allow customers to select their order, the meal choice process is something that happens organically & is supported by preferences for “preselection”

For us, we leverage a few services, and bake meal choice into the customer experience as something implicit:

* At checkout we use CRS (customer-recurring-selections) to set up a monthly automatic meal-choice
* When a customer edits the contents of their order we _tbd_ in order to propagate updates
* in other words, interaction with menus does still exist but it happens under the hood
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
*Acceptance Criteria*

Document the manner in which meal choice is communicated to the backend and how it is preserved month-over-month.

Highlight any/all known services involved in the process.

Suggestion: [https://hellofresh.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TTH/pages/4808933482/Engineering+Relics|https://hellofresh.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TTH/pages/4808933482/Engineering+Relics|smart-link] 
{panel}

[~accountid:712020:4b6a0b29-53dc-45ce-82fb-0ac6a91e6feb] I don’t think we need it anymore. Actually the meal index is using the same approach as we have been using so far.

issues.summary: [Multi-cadence] As an active customer on my-deliveries, I wish to see a section describing details of my subscription
issues.description:
h1. Display Delivery Frequency in Plan Settings

Priority: *Wish*

h2. User Story / Description:

As an active Factor Form user, I need to see my current delivery frequency in the Plan Settings section of My Deliveries page, so that I can easily access and update this information when needed.

h2. Acceptance Criteria:

* Add a “Plan Settings” panel at the bottom of My Deliveries page
* Add a "Delivery Frequency" section to the Plan Settings panel in My Deliveries page
* Display the current delivery frequency (4, 6, or 8 weeks)
* Provide a way to update the delivery frequency from this section
* Use the same frequency change modal as in the Manage Delivery section

h2. Testing Requirements:

* Verify that the delivery frequency is correctly displayed in Plan Settings
* Verify that clicking the update option opens the frequency change modal
* Confirm that changes made in this modal are reflected in the Plan Settings section
* Test that the UI is responsive and looks good on both mobile and desktop
* Ensure the feature works for users with different current delivery frequencies

h2. AI Developer Suggestions:

# Add a Plan Settings component to My Deliveries and include a section for delivery frequency:
{noformat}// Example component structure
<PlanSettingsSection title="Delivery Frequency">
  <DeliveryFrequencyDisplay
    frequency={deliveryFrequency}
    onUpdateClick={openFrequencyModal}
  />
</PlanSettingsSection>{noformat}
# Create a display component for the current delivery frequency:
{noformat}const DeliveryFrequencyDisplay = ({ frequency, onUpdateClick }) => (
  <Box display="flex" justifyContent="space-between" alignItems="center">
    <Text>Every {frequency} weeks</Text>
    <Button
      variant="text"
      onClick={onUpdateClick}
      data-testid="update-frequency-btn"
    >
      Update
    </Button>
  </Box>
);{noformat}
# Share the frequency change modal between the Plan Settings and Manage Delivery sections:
{noformat}// In the parent component
const

issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Description:*
When navigating to the my-deliveries page, components under the “Complete your wellness routine” section are re-rendering.

See this slack thread for additional context:
[https://hellofresh.slack.com/archives/C0374928SNN/p1763053435311579|https://hellofresh.slack.com/archives/C0374928SNN/p1763053435311579|smart-link] 

*Steps to Reproduce:*
1. On staging, login with the following credentials:
user: [edwin+sub@hellofresh.ca|mailto:edwin+sub@hellofresh.ca]
pass: factor1Test$
2. Navigate to {{/my-deliveries}}
3. View the components under the “Complete your wellness routine” section re-rendering
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
*Expected result:*

* Components do not re-render

*Testing Requirements:*

* Staging env
* User details
** user: [edwin+sub@hellofresh.ca|mailto:edwin+sub@hellofresh.ca]
** pass: factor1Test$
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
*Actual result:*

* Component re-render
{panel}
